Text.val: 21.11.2014 SH SCR19340 Check7: Changed test CVLR_EXISTINGREINS_AMOUNTH > CVLR_REQUESTEDLIMIT_AMOUNTH
@Event is called 3 times (within check 3,6,7) to make sure that always the most actual data is used
-- Define subselects on table DHIC to select table DEBC for check 3,6,7
-- Define where clauses for DEBC selection, used to select DEBC for check 3,6,7

Comment.val: /*Check 1. Debtor number client exists but with a different EH-id or different registration number/*

Text.val: -- Check 1. Debtor number client exists but with a different EH-id or different registration number
-- Check 2. EH-id exists with different registration number(s)
-- Check 3. Is there an existing limit with another affiliate / branche office, and is the existing limit = requested amount?
-- Check 4: If Debtor type = 2,3,4, 5 or 6 Or if MC35 or MC89 on debtor level
... skip testing DEBC if DEBH_DEBTORTYPE in (2,3,4,5,6,7)
-- Check 6: Existing reinsurance limit* = 0 or If existing grade value = 0,00
-- Check 7: Existing reinsurance limit >= request amount or Existing grade value > = request amount
-- Check 8: New request = current credit limit
-- Check 9: New request < current credit limit

ExpSyntax.val: 'or A.DEBC_DEBH in (select C.DHIC_DEBH from '&Trim({32768,9})&'/DHIC C where C.DHIC_ID='&''''&Trim({0,62})&''''&' and C.DHIC_INFS_CODE='&''''&'EU'&''''&')'
'or F.DEBH_NO in (select G.DHIC_DEBH from '&Trim({32768,9})&'/DHIC G where G.DHIC_ID='&''''&Trim({0,62})&''''&' and G.DHIC_INFS_CODE='&''''&'EU'&''''&')'
'or A.DEBC_DEBH in (select D.DHIC_DEBH from '&Trim({32768,9})&'/DHIC D where D.DHIC_ID='&''''&Trim({0,64})&''''&' and D.DHIC_INFS_CODE='&''''&Trim({0,66})&''''&')'
'or F.DEBH_NO in (select H.DHIC_DEBH from '&Trim({32768,9})&'/DHIC H where H.DHIC_ID='&''''&Trim({0,64})&''''&' and H.DHIC_INFS_CODE='&''''&Trim({0,66})&''''&')'
'(A.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM is null or A.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM=0 or A.DEBC_GRADE_AMOUNT=0) and A.DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE=1'
'((A.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM is not null and A.DEBC_REINSURANCELIM>0) or A.DEBC_GRADE_AMOUNT>0) and A.DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE=1'

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select count(*) from :1/DHIC where DHIC_ID = ':2' and DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'EU'

Select count(*), min(DHIC_DEBH) from :1/DHIC where trim(DHIC_ID)<>'' and DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'BE' and exists(select * from :1/EHR1 where EHR1_IDNUMBER = DHIC_ID and EHR1_REQID = :2 and EHR1_LINENO = :3 and EHR1_IDTYPE = 'TVABE') for fetch only

Select distinct A.DEBC_NO, A.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC A join :1/CLNT B on B.CLNT101_ADMNO=A.DEBC_ADMNO and B.CLNT102_CLNTNO=A.DEBC_CLNTNO and B.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO=:2 and B.CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO=:3 where ( A.DEBC_DEBH = :4 :5 :6 or A.DEBC_DEBH in ( select E.DEBH_NO from :1/DEBH E where E.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH>0 and E.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH in ( select F.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH from :1/DEBH F where F.DEBH_NO = :4 :7 :8 ) ) ) and A.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and :9 order by A.DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: @Task is called 3 times (within check 3, 6 and 7) to select debtor client

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select count(*) from :1/DHIC A where A.DHIC_ID = ':2' and A.DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'EU' and exists(select * from :1/DHIC B where B.DHIC_DEBH=A.DHIC_DEBH and B.DHIC_ID <> ':3' and B.DHIC_INFS_CODE = ':4') for fetch only
